ExampleDefinition.ToolTipDescription: Demonstrates Market/Volume Profile Series types for financial charting
ExampleDefinition.Description:
[b]Key Features Demonstrated[/b]
-[b]Candlestick Series[/b] with Volume bars is rendered using [url='https://www.scichart.com/documentation/win/current/webframe.html#The%20Market%20Profile%20RenderableSeries.html']FastHistoBarRenderableSeries[/url]. It supports three visualization modes for individual tick volumes within each bar: Volume Ladder, Cumulative Volume and Volume Profile -[b]Volume Candlestick Series[/b] is rendered using [url='https://www.scichart.com/documentation/win/current/webframe.html#The%20Market%20Profile%20RenderableSeries.html']FastVolumeCandlestickRenderableSeries[/url] and represents cumulative volume for each candlestick. Each bar visualizes volume dynamics using High, Low, and Close volume values -[b]SMA-20 Overlay[/b], applied to cumulative volume, is rendered with [url='https://www.scichart.com/documentation/win/current/webframe.html#The%20Line%20Series%20Type.html']FastLineRenderableSeries[/url], providing a smooth volume trend indicator -[b]Volume Profile Chart[/b], visualizing volume distribution across the entire data range, is rendered with [url='https://www.scichart.com/documentation/win/current/webframe.html#The%20Market%20Profile%20RenderableSeries.html']FastMarketProfileRenderableSeries[/url] -[b]IndexDateTimeAxis[/b] for X-Axis. [url='https://www.scichart.com/documentation/win/current/webframe.html#IndexDateTimeAxis.html']IndexDateTimeAxis[/url] automatically collapses overnight and weekend gaps in data
[b]Interactive Features[/b]
-[b]Rollover with Tooltips[/b], powered by [url='https://www.scichart.com/documentation/win/current/webframe.html#RolloverModifier.html']RolloverModifier[/url] -[b]Zooming[/b] with mouse wheel and click-and-drag, provided by [url='https://www.scichart.com/documentation/win/current/webframe.html#MouseWheelZoomModifier.html']MouseWheelZoomModifier[/url] and [url='https://www.scichart.com/documentation/win/current/webframe.html#RubberBandXyZoomModifier.html']RubberBandXyZoomModifier[/url] -[b]Panning[/b] with Right Mouse Button via click-and-drag, enabled by [url='https://www.scichart.com/documentation/win/current/webframe.html#ZoomPanModifier.html']ZoomPanModifier[/url]
